    • Method Detail

      • getHtml

        public java.lang.String getHtml(java.lang.Long recordId,
                       java.lang.String model)
        Root method to access the service. It find record from given recordId and process html template to generate html report.
        Parameters:
        recordId - RecordId to fetch data.
        model - Full name of model.
        Returns:
        Generated html report.

      • getTemplate

        public java.lang.String getTemplate(java.lang.String model)
        Method find html template from given model. It also process o2m/m2m tables to match correct syntax of template.
        Parameters:
        model - Model fullName to search template.
        Returns:
        Html template.
